92.eng-name: Afflictions and the End of the World

hadiths.text: Narrated Jabir:A man passed through the mosque and he was carrying arrows, the heads of which were exposed (protruding). The man was ordered (by the Prophet) to hold the iron heads so that it might not scratch (injure) any Muslim

chapter.ara-name: باب قَوْلِ النَّبِيِّ صلى الله عليه وسلم " مَنْ حَمَلَ عَلَيْنَا السِّلاَحَ فَلَيْسَ مِنَّا "
chapter.eng-name: “Whosoever takes up arms against us, is not from us.”
